fossils, found in 1997, were so fragmented that it took years of cleaning, re-assembling and analyzing before discoverers felt they could report their findings; photos; map (L)')('2003061', "Peter Bruin Hays III column argues Thomas L Friedman's premise that no one wants service cuts is elitist thinking people in so-called 'red states' find maddening (Jun 11 Op-Ed article)")('2003061', 'Winthrop Patterson Baker Jr, who went from Westinghouse Broadcasting television executive to running deluxe New England bed-and-breakfasts, dies at age 71;
